scenes.imagePrompt: A warm, colorful storybook illustration of a cheerful village street food stall. Lala Ram, a plump, smiling man with a mustache, is frying golden, crispy jalebis in a large kadhai. Bright sunlight, magical glow on the sweets.
Lala Ram is frowning slightly, counting jalebis meticulously with his finger. A small, innocent village child stands nearby, looking hopeful but slightly sad. Soft, warm lighting, storybook style.

Lala Ram looks shocked and confused, holding a pale, dull-looking jalebi. The frying pan looks smoky, and the syrup (chaashni) looks watery instead of thick and golden. Magical, slightly sad atmosphere, storybook illustration.

Lala Ram is now smiling genuinely, happily distributing the jalebis to a group of cheerful, smiling children. The jalebis in the basket are glowing golden and perfect again. Warm, bright, happy storybook illustration.
A final, beautiful storybook illustration showing Lala Ram's stall bustling with happy customers and children. The jalebis are sparkling with magical sweetness. Text overlay: Sharing is Sweet.
